name: df-trkg2d
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7, setvar s8
body: |- wceq(cstrkg2d, cab(s0, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cds, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(citv, cv(s0)), wa(wrex(s4, cv(s1), wrex(s5, cv(s1), wrex(s6, cv(s1), wn(w3o(wcel(cv(s6), co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s5))), wcel(cv(s4), co(cv(s6), cv(s3), cv(s5))), wcel(cv(s5), co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s6)))))))), wral(s4, cv(s1), wral(s5, cv(s1), wral(s6, cv(s1), wral(s7, cv(s1), wral(s8, cv(s1), wi(wa(w3a(wceq(co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s7)), co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s8))), wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s7)), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s8))), wceq(co(cv(s6), cv(s2), cv(s7)), co(cv(s6), cv(s2), cv(s8)))), wne(cv(s7), cv(s8))), w3o(wcel(cv(s6), co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s5))), wcel(cv(s4), co(cv(s6), cv(s3), cv(s5))), wcel(cv(s5), co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s6))))))))))))))))
comment: Define the class of geometries fulfilling the lower dimension axiom, Axiom A8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 12, and the upper dimension axiom, Axiom A9 of [Schwabhauser] p. 13, for dimension 2. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Mar-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)
